name: BollingerMeanReversionVBT
description: Mean reversion strategy - buy when price touches lower BB, sell when price touches upper BB with 30 point stop loss
code:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import ta
from engine.vbt_strategy import VectorBTStrategy, TradeSignal

class BollingerMeanReversionVBT(VectorBTStrategy):
    def generate_signals(self, df):
        bb = ta.volatility.BollingerBands(df['close'], window=self.params.get('bb_period', 20), window_dev=self.params.get('bb_std', 2))
        upper = bb.bollinger_hband()
        lower = bb.bollinger_lband()
        stop_points = self.params.get('stop_loss_points', 30)
        
        # Entry when price touches or goes below lower band
        entries = (df['close'] <= lower).fillna(False).values
        
        # Exit when price touches or goes above upper band OR stop loss hit
        # For vectorized stop loss, we'll use a simplified approach
        # In practice, VectorBT will handle proper stop loss execution
        exits = (df['close'] >= upper).fillna(False).values
        
        return TradeSignal(entries=entries, exits=exits)
